title: DRDO Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 08 Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 08 Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Mechanical Engineering, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the DRDO Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible cand...
